faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.ctaText: Contact us directly and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
faqPage.q1: How long does it take to process an order?
faqPage.a1: Orders are processed within 24-48 business hours of receipt. After processing, you will receive a confirmation email with order details and delivery information.
faqPage.a2: We accept card payments (Visa, Mastercard), bank transfer, and cash on delivery.
faqPage.a3: Delivery costs 15 RON for orders under 300 RON. For orders over 300 RON, delivery is free.
faqPage.q4: How long will my order take to arrive?
faqPage.a4: After order processing, delivery time is 1-3 business days for locations in Romania.
faqPage.q5: How can I return a product?
faqPage.a5: You can return products within 14 days of receiving your order. Please contact us before sending the package back to receive instructions on the return procedure.
faqPage.q6: What if I receive a damaged product?
faqPage.a6: If you receive a damaged product, please contact us within 48 hours of receiving the order. We will offer solutions for product replacement or a refund.
faqPage.q7: Do you offer installation services for curtains and drapes?
faqPage.a7: Yes, we offer installation services for curtains and drapes in Bucharest and nearby localities. The service cost depends on the complexity of the installation and will be calculated based on your specific requirements.
faqPage.q8: How do I choose the right size for curtains and drapes?
faqPage.a8: To choose the right size, measure the width and height of your window. We recommend that the width of the curtains be 1.5-2 times greater than the window width for an elegant and full look. If you have specific questions, do not hesitate to contact us for assistance.
faqPage.q9: How can I cancel an order?
faqPage.a9: You can cancel an order by contacting us by phone or email as soon as possible after placing the order. If the order has already been processed or shipped, it can no longer be canceled, and you will need to follow the return procedure.
faqPage.q10: How can I track my order status?
faqPage.a10: Order status can be tracked through your customer account on the website. You will also receive email notifications about changes in your order status.
faqPage.q11: What materials are recommended for the kitchen?
faqPage.a11: For the kitchen, we recommend easy-to-maintain and stain-resistant materials, such as polyester or cotton-polyester blends. There are also materials with special anti-stain and flame-retardant treatments, ideal for the cooking area.
faqPage.q12: Can I place an order without creating an account?
faqPage.a12: Yes, you can place an order as a guest without creating an account. However, creating an account allows you to track your orders and benefit from special promotions.

mainSection.title: About Casa Draperiilor
mainSection.p1: Casa Draperiilor is a specialized store in high-quality curtains and drapes, offering personalized solutions for window decoration in any type of home or commercial space.
mainSection.p2: With over 15 years of experience in the field, we have built our reputation on quality products, impeccable services, and attention to detail. Our team of professionals is dedicated to helping you find the perfect solution for your windows.
mainSection.p3: Whether you want to create an elegant ambiance for the living room, ensure privacy in the bedroom, or add a splash of color to the kitchen, we are here to offer advice and products that will turn your vision into reality.

value1.title: Quality
value1.description: We only work with premium materials and trusted suppliers to offer durable and aesthetic products that stand the test of time.

value2.title: Personalized Services
value2.description: Each client is unique, which is why we offer personalized consultancy and solutions tailored to individual needs and preferences.

value3.title: Innovation
value3.description: We constantly follow trends in interior design and bring the latest materials and technologies to offer you modern and functional options.

storySection.title: Our Story
storySection.p1: Casa Draperiilor started as a small family business in 2007, when our founder, Alexandru Popescu, passionate about textiles and interior design, opened the first store in Bucharest.
storySection.p2: Over the years, we have grown steadily, adding new collections and expanding our services to meet the ever-evolving demands of our customers. In 2015, we launched the online store to make our products accessible to customers across the country.
storySection.p3: Today, Casa Draperiilor is a reference name in the field of curtains and drapes. We have expanded not only in Romania but also in Eastern Europe, and have a strong online presence. We continue to be guided by the same principles that have defined us from the beginning: quality, excellent services, and a passion for beauty.
